jd: From: ayush, Scalable Systems ayush.yadav@scalable-systems.com Reply to: ayush.yadav@scalable-systems.com Technical E2E Project Manager - BFSI DomainLocation: Phoenix, AZExperience: 10+ yearsRole Summary:We are seeking a seasoned Technical E2E Project Manager with a proven track record in delivering complex projects within the Banking, Financial Services, and Insurance (BFSI) domain. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of Agile methodologies and be adept at coordinating with multiple application teams to ensure successful project execution.Key Responsibilities:Project Management:Oversee the entire project lifecycle, from initiation to closure, ensuring adherence to timelines, budget, and quality standards.Implement and manage Agile project methodologies (e.g., Scrum, Kanban) to drive efficient and effective project delivery.Coordinate with various stakeholders, including business analysts, developers, testers, and subject matter experts, to ensure alignment and effective collaboration.Technical Expertise:Possess a strong understanding of technical concepts and architectures within the BFSI domain.Collaborate with technical teams to define project requirements, design solutions, and oversee development activities.Provide technical guidance and support to project teams throughout the project lifecycle.Risk Management:Identify, assess, and mitigate project risks to minimize potential disruptions and ensure successful project outcomes.Develop and implement contingency plans to address unforeseen challenges.Communication and Stakeholder Management:Effectively communicate project status, progress, and issues to stakeholders at all levels.Build and maintain strong relationships with clients, team members, and other stakeholders.Tool Proficiency:Experience with project management tools like Rally is a must.Domain Expertise:Prior experience working on projects within the BFSI domain, particularly in the credit card industry, is essential.Familiarity with mainframe and distributed systems is a significant advantage.Testing Experience:Previous experience as an E2E Test Manager is a plus.Required Skills and Qualifications:Agile Certification: Certified Agile practitioner (e.g., Scrum Master, Certified Scrum Product Owner)Project Management Experience: Minimum 10+ years of experience in managing complex technical projectsDomain Expertise: Deep understanding of the BFSI domain, especially credit card operationsTechnical Proficiency: Familiarity with mainframe and distributed systemsCommunication Skills: Excellent written and verbal communication skillsProblem-solving: Ability to analyze complex problems and develop effective solutionsLeadership: Strong leadership skills to motivate and guide project teamsKeywords:Technical Project Manager, E2E Project Manager, Agile Project Management, BFSI, Banking, Credit Card, Mainframe, Distributed Systems, Rally, Project Management Tools, Agile Certification, Scrum, Kanban, Risk Management, Stakeholder Management
